text: After a wild report claimed Wilmer Valderrama was longing to marry his ex Demi Lovato following her overdose, fans went wild about a potential engagement! Now, we have the real scoop and you ’ ve got to hear this! Did Demi Lovato ‘ s overdose really make Wilmer Valderrama, 38, realize that he wants to marry her? — The answer is NO, despite a report which has claimed otherwise. “ Marriage with Demi at one point in Wilmer ’ s life was something that was talked about while they were dating, ” a source tells HollywoodLife. com EXCLUSIVELY. “ There were many occasions where he almost popped the question. ” However, that was then and this is now. “ Wilmer
